00045 class parameter {
00046     typedef boost::function< void () >  user_func_without_arg;
00047     typedef std::set< size_t >          orders_storage; 
00048 public:
00049     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00050                         , const std::string& full_name
00051                         , void ( *fn )() ) :
00052             func_without_arg( fn ) {
00053         init( short_name, full_name );
00054     } 
00055     
00056     template< typename ArgType >
00057     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00058                         , const std::string& full_name
00059                         , void ( *fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00060             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( fn ) ) {
00061         init( short_name, full_name );
00062     }
00063 
00064     template< typename ArgType >
00065     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00066                         , const std::string& full_name
00067                         , void ( *fn )( ArgType ) ) :
00068             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( fn ) ) {
00069         init( short_name, full_name );
00070     }
00071 
00072     template< typename ObjectType >
00073     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00074                         , const std::string& full_name
00075                         , ObjectType* obj
00076                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )() ) :
00077             func_without_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj ) ) {
00078         init( short_name, full_name );
00079     }
00080     
00081     template< typename ObjectType >
00082     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00083                         , const std::string& full_name
00084                         , ObjectType* obj
00085                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )() const ) :
00086             func_without_arg( boost::bind( fn, obj ) ) {
00087         init( short_name, full_name );
00088     }
00089 
00090     template
00091     < 
00092         typename ObjectType
00093         , typename ArgType 
00094     >
00095     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00096                         , const std::string& full_name
00097                         , ObjectType* obj
00098                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( const ArgType& ) ) :
00099             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00100         init( short_name, full_name );
00101     }
00102     
00103     template
00104     < 
00105         typename ObjectType
00106         , typename ArgType 
00107     >

00109                         , const std::string& full_name
00110                         , ObjectType* obj
00111                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( const ArgType& ) const ) :
00112             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00113         init( short_name, full_name );

00125             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {

00131         typename ObjectType

00134     explicit parameter( const std::string&   short_name
00135                         , const std::string& full_name
00136                         , ObjectType* obj
00137                         , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) :
00138             for_arg( boost::make_shared< argument_holder<ArgType> >( obj, fn ) ) {
00139         init( short_name, full_name );
00140     } 
00141 private:
00142     void init( const std::string& _short_name, const std::string& _full_name ) {   
00143         short_name           = _short_name;
00144         full_name            = _full_name;
00145         is_necessary         = false;
00146         is_has_default_value = false;
00147         semantic             = no_semantic;
00148         order_number         = 0;
00149     } 
00150 public:
00151     std::string             short_name;
00152     std::string             full_name;
00153     bool                    is_necessary;
00154     bool                    is_has_default_value;
00155     any                     for_arg;
00156     user_func_without_arg   func_without_arg;
00157     value_semantic          semantic;
00158     int                     order_number;
00159     static orders_storage   orders;
00160 public:
00161     bool has_default_value() const { return is_has_default_value; }
00162     bool it_is_necessary() const { return is_necessary; }
00163 public:
00164     parameter& check_semantic( const value_semantic& _semantic ) {
00165         check_semantic_validity( _semantic );
00166         semantic = _semantic;
00167         return *this;
00168     }
00169 private:
00170     void check_semantic_validity( const value_semantic& _semantic ) const {
00171         if ( _semantic < no_semantic || _semantic > email ) {
00172             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix()
00173                     + "Incorrect value of semantic, supports only 'path', 'ipv4', 'ipv6', 'ip' and 'email'!";
00174             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00175         } else {}
00176     }
00177 public:
00178     parameter& necessary() {
00179         check_parameter_default_value_existence();
00180         is_necessary = true;
00181         return *this;
00182     }
00183 private:
00184     void check_validity_of_string_default_value( const any& value ) const {
00185         if ( typeid( std::string ) == value.type() ) {
00186             const std::string value_as_string = boost::any_cast< std::string >( value );
00187             if ( boost::contains( value_as_string, " " ) ) {
00188                 const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00189                                                   + "Invalid default parameter's value '" + short_name 
00190                                                   + "': it shouldn't contains space(s)!";
00191                 throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00192             } else {}
00193         } else {}
00194     } 
00195 
00196     void check_parameter_necessity() const {
00197         if ( is_necessary ) {
00198             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00199                                               + "Parameter '" + short_name
00200                                               + "' defined as necessary, it cannot have default value!"; 
00201             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00202         } else {}
00203     }
00204 
00205     void check_parameter_default_value_existence() const {
00206         if ( is_has_default_value ) {
00207             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix()
00208                                               + "Parameter '" + short_name 
00209                                               + "' already have default value, it cannot be necessary!"; 
00210             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00211         } else {}
00212     }
00213 private:
00214     argument_caster caster;
00215 public:
00216     parameter& default_value( const any& value ) {
00217         check_parameter_necessity();
00218         check_validity_of_string_default_value( value );
00219         is_has_default_value = true;
00220         caster.store_default_value( for_arg, value, short_name );
00221         return *this;
00222     }
00223 private:
00224 template< typename ExpectedType >
00225     ExpectedType check_type_of_default_value( const any& value ) const {
00226         ExpectedType default_value;
00227         if ( typeid( default_value ) == value.type() ) {
00228             default_value = boost::any_cast< ExpectedType >( value );
00229         } else {
00230             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00231                                               + "Incorrect default value's type of parameter '" 
00232                                               + short_name + "'!";
00233             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00234         }
00235         return default_value;
00236     }
00237 public:
00241     parameter& default_value( const char* value ) {
00242         return default_value( std::string( value ) );
00243     }
00244 public:
00245     parameter& order( int _order_number ) {
00246         order_number = _order_number;
00247         check_order_validity();
00248         check_order_uniqueness(); 
00249         return *this;
00250     }
00251 private:
00252     void check_order_validity() const {
00253         if ( order_number < 1 ) {
00254             o_stream what_happened;
00255             what_happened << lib_prefix()
00256                           << "Invalid order number '" << order_number << "' "
00257                           << "(parameter '" << short_name << "'), "
00258                           << "it cannot be less than 1!";
00259             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened.str() );
00260         } else {}
00261     }
00262 
00263     void check_order_uniqueness() {
00264         const size_t current_orders_quantity = orders.size();
00265         orders.insert( order_number );
00266         const size_t new_orders_quantity = orders.size();
00267         if ( current_orders_quantity == new_orders_quantity ) {
00268             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Parameter's order number must be unique!";
00269             throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00270         } else {}
00271     }
00272 public:
00273     bool operator==( const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00274         return parameter_name == short_name || parameter_name == full_name;
00275     }
00276 
00277     bool operator==( int _order_number ) const {
00278         return _order_number == order_number;
00279     }
00280 };
